summary: Completed testing of P1 & P2 features for Masjid Muktamirin website. All 14 backend API tests pass. Fixed missing Informasi tab in navigation. All features working: Ramadan schedule (30 days), Islamic quotes, Articles CRUD, QRIS settings, ZIS charts with Recharts.
passed_tests: Backend: /api/ramadan/schedule returns 30 days of Ramadan data (2025-03-01 to 2025-03-30)
Backend: /api/quotes/random returns random active quote with arabic_text and translation
Backend: /api/articles CRUD (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) all pass
Backend: /api/articles/{id} increments view count on GET
Backend: /api/zis/monthly-chart returns 12 months of chart data
Backend: /api/zis/summary returns monthly totals for zakat/infaq/shodaqoh
Frontend: Homepage displays Quote Islami card with arabic text + translation from database
Frontend: Homepage displays ZIS summary card (Perolehan ZIS Bulan Ini)
Frontend: Homepage displays QRIS quick donation section
Frontend: /homepage/informasi shows ZIS charts with Recharts (bar + pie)
Frontend: /homepage/informasi displays QRIS image and bank details
Frontend: Dashboard /connect/articles page for managing articles
Frontend: Dashboard /connect/qris page for QRIS settings with save button
critical_code_review_comments: InformasiPage.jsx: Uses Recharts for bar and pie charts - working correctly
HomePage.jsx: Random quote fetched from /api/quotes/random on page load
QRISSettingsPage.jsx: Properly checks admin role before allowing updates
seed_data_creation: Ramadan schedule (30 days) and Islamic quotes (5) seeded via seed_data.py

mocked_apis_note.note: All APIs are fully implemented with real database operations

context_for_next_testing_agent: P1 & P2 features complete: Ramadan schedule seeded with 30 days (2025-03-01 to 2025-03-30), 5 Islamic quotes seeded in database, InformasiPage shows ZIS charts using Recharts, Homepage displays random quote from DB, Dashboard has Articles and QRIS Settings pages. Navigation fixed to include Informasi tab.
